title: Regional connectivity vital to gain prosperity for people: Zahra Baloch
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 15 (APP):Foreign Office Spokesperson Mumtaz Zahra Baloch on Tuesday said that Pakistan strongly desires to continue work for regional connectivity.
China Pakistan Economic Corridor (CPEC), is playing vital role for  strengthening regional connectivity, she said while talking to a private television channel.
In reply to a question about foreign policy, she said organizing SCO summit in Pakistan is a big achievement of foreign policy.
Through SCO, she said, we will have discussion with leaders of Central Asian States to enhance relations on trade, energy and railway sector, which she added further promote regional connectivity.
She said talks are also underway with Turkey to link up roads with Railway.
